animal.name: White-tailed deer
animal.habitat: Can survive in many habitats, but prefer mixtures of hardwood trees, brush, crops, and pastures.
animal.funFact: Only the male deer has antlers. The fawns are born with white spots to help camoflauge them which fade away with age.

animal.name: Mallard
animal.funFact: The female mallard is brown. Mallards swim with their tail above the water so that they can quickly spring out of the water if needed. (Source: MN DNR website)
